title: Pakistan Navy (Extension of Service) Act, 1950
description: Official consolidated text of Pakistan Navy (Extension of Service) Act, 1950 (XXIV of 1950) published by The Pakistan Code (Military Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, and commencement
provisions.content:
_(1) This Act may be called the 2* Pakistan Navy
(Extension of Service) Act, 1950.
(2) It shall come into force at once
